        public WehrmachtEnigma(Plugboard plugboard,
                       int rotor1,
                       int rotor2,
                       int rotor3,
                       char[] startPositions,
                       Reflector reflector)
        The WehrmachtEnigma takes 3 rotors from the set of rotors I-V
        Parameters:
        plugboard -
        rotor1 - An integer between 1 and 5 inclusive to refer to one of the 5 available rotors of the Wehrmacht enigma.
        rotor2 - As for rotor1.
        rotor3 - As for rotor1.
        startPositions - A 3 element char array of starting positions, chars 'A'-'Z' are valid.
        reflector -
